pages.text: A simple regular furnace is not enough for the practice of witchcraft. $(br2)Indeed, a specifically designed oven made out of iron is needed $(o)(it looking much more stylish is an added plus).

Such oven functions as a regular furnace in that it will require fuel to burn various burnables; however, it also has a specific slot for $(item)$(o)clay jars$() which allows you to collect different byproducts, magical or otherwise.$(2br)$(o)Just... don't cook any children in it...$()
